name: Beans Inc
description:
First person restaurant tycoon. Help your tired customers with some caffeine, and supplementals. Build your store, upgrade your machines and become a world famous coffeeshop.

The game is currently in early technical alpha. Nearly everything is subject to change, though I wanted to get this out to you guys to have some fun with!

The game will move into a closed alpha stage. Please read the news section below for more info.
